definitions.definition: existing since the beginning, or being the earliest form of something:
An original piece of work, such as a painting, etc. is produced by the artist and not a copy:
the first one made and not a copy:
examples: Can you give me the original of your report? I can't read this copy.

definitions.definition: a piece of work by a famous artist or designer and not a copy by someone else:
examples: If the painting is an original, it will be very valuable.

definitions.definition: If you read something in the original, you read it in the language in which it was first written.
